title: Textile, "Dobeckman Dazzle", 1948
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic, metallic
Technique: uncut loops of a supplementary warp in a 2/2 twill foundation (velvet); hand woven
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 293 x 128 cm (9 ft. 7 3/8 in. x 50 3/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
